title: Reusable Prompt Template
description: A structured, reusable prompt template with sections for role, context, task, constraints (length, tone, format), examples, and notes.
prompt:
<promptTemplate>
  <role>
    <!-- Define the persona or expertise the AI should assume -->
    Act as a [specific role/persona, e.g., "senior software engineer"]
  </role>

  <context>
    <!-- Provide essential background or scenario details -->
    [Insert relevant background information, e.g., project goals, domain knowledge]
  </context>

  <task>
    <!-- State the main objective clearly -->
    [Describe exactly what needs to be done, e.g., "Generate optimized Python code for data processing"]
  </task>

  <constraints>
    <length>
      <!-- Specify length requirements -->
      [e.g., "200 words maximum" or "detailed step-by-step"]
    </length>
    <tone>
      <!-- Define style, tone, or voice -->
      [e.g., "professional and concise" or "friendly and engaging"]
    </tone>
    <format>
      <!-- Define desired output format -->
      [e.g., "XML", "Markdown", "bullet points"]
    </format>
  </constraints>

  <examples>
    <example>
      <!-- Provide sample input/output for guidance -->
      [Insert one or more examples of expected outputs]
    </example>
  </examples>

  <notes>
    <!-- Optional: Extra instructions, edge cases, or special rules -->
    [Add clarifications if needed, e.g., "Avoid technical jargon" or "Ensure cross-platform compatibility"]
  </notes>
</promptTemplate>
